pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 8, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 8, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in a group photograph of all parliamentarians to mark the 150th anniversary of the first meeting on Parliament Hill.

Centre Block
Main Entrance
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Toronto, Ontario

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion for The Canada Summit - Disrupting the Status Quo, hosted by The Economist.

Frontenac Ballroom
The Westin Harbour Castle
1 Harbour Square
Toronto, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
